sentences.sentence: Mummy of Egypt's monotheist pharaoh to return home.
sentences.translation: 埃及一神论法老木乃伊即将返回故土。

sentences.sentence: He was rather a Judaic monotheist of the school of Maimonides. He arrived at this conclusion, not on so-to-speak rational or sceptical grounds, but entirely on the interpretation of ancient authority.
sentences.translation: 他到达这一结论，不是站在“如此这般说来”的理性或怀疑的立场上，而是整个基于古代权威的解释。
